document.full_text: israeli security officials said that the two suspects, ages 17 and 18, had confessed and carried out a reconstruction of the attack that occurred last month in the jewish settlement of itamar.
document.title: 2 palestinian teens held in killing of israeli family
lines_and_colors: israeli security officials said that the two suspects, ages 17 and 18, had confessed and carried out a reconstruction of the attack that occurred last month in the jewish settlement of itamar.
